Title: Requires law enforcement and district attorneys offices to advise human trafficking victims of the availability of social and legal services
Summary: Requires law enforcement agencies and district attorney's offices to advise human trafficking victims of the availability of social and legal services; unless law enforcement agencies and district attorney's offices are notified by the victim that they do not want such services, such law enforcement agency shall contact the appropriate provider and request that a representative be provided.
LawCode: Amd ยง483-cc, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to advising human trafficking victims of the availability of social and legal services
